title: Audit HRIS Data Integrity
description: An HRIS analyst needs to run an audit to find employees with missing or incomplete data in their records.

tasks.description: Run a query or report to find employee records with blank fields for critical information (e.g., emergency contact, address).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst generates a list of employees with incomplete profiles.

tasks.description: For each employee on the list, determine what specific information is missing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a spreadsheet detailing the missing data for each employee.

tasks.description: Send notifications to the identified employees asking them to update their information in the self-service portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst sends targeted emails requesting employees to complete their profiles.
